snippet.title: Sixit Trailer: Out Now on PC & Mobile
snippet.description:
PC (Itch): https://stargardengames.itch.io/sixit
iOS (App Store): https://apps.apple.com/us/app/sixit/id1449678025
Android (Google Play Store): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.stargardengames.Sixit

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/qCZyTrZacJ
Follow the devs: https://twitter.com/stargardengames
Sixit Press Kit: http://stargardengames.com/sixit-press-kit

Sixit is a small narrative puzzle game launching April 28, 2021, on the App Store, Google Play, and Itch.io.

With only SIX actions per run, you must explore the forest, solve its puzzles, and save your friends from the Great Storm.

#indiedev​ #indiegame​ #puzzlegame​
